itunes:title: #89 - When Your Metrics Suck
title: #89 - When Your Metrics Suck
description:
How do you use your metrics and analytics for your online business? In today's episode, we're talking about what to do when your metrics suck and how to create content that gets good metrics and traffic. We're talking about what we do for Being Boss, what we're planning to up our game for Being Boss, and our tips for how to read and use your analytics for your online business.

—

Listen to more Being Boss shows on our website, on Apple Podcasts, or wherever you listen to podcasts.

Follow Being Boss on Instagram: @beingbossclub

Join the Being Boss Community: beingboss.club/community
